price: 5. Jis sakė: „Mano Viešpatie, tikrai aš kviečiau savo žmones (į tiesą) naktį ir dieną.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
